page.title: 09HOUSING (3)
page.content: {RENTED}A large proportion of the tenants on the housing estate rent the propery that they live in. {NEW BUILDINGS }They are in the process of building one to three bedroomed bungalows for Senior Citizens and Disabled persons. In the parade, being constructed a Leisure Centre Complex attached to the Swimming Baths. {URBAN RENEWAL}There has been a great deal of rebuilding taking place in Speke recently. They have altered the three story town houses and made them into bungalows and semi-detatched houses, and in the spaces left where they have knocked them down there are new houses being built or open grass. {CHANGE}The Park has been enlarged by knocking down some of the houses and a large number of trees have now been planted on the landscaped hills with many pathways running between them.
